Souls of Children Versus Ease and Comfort 

     Let children no longer be exposed to the temptations of the cities that are ripe for destruction. The Lord has sent us warning and 
                                                                           13
counsel to get out of the cities. Then let us make no more investments in the cities. Fathers and mothers, how do you regard the souls of your children? Are you preparing the members of your families for translation into the heavenly courts? Are you preparing them to become members of the royal family? children of the heavenly King? "What shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?" How will ease, comfort, convenience, compare with the value of the souls of your children?--Manuscript 76, 1905.
